attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502066. 2 YEAR 30 000 SERVICE PLAN
5 YEAR 150 000KM WARRANTY

EXPERIENCE FIRST-OF-ITS-KIND MODULARITY
The ultra-modular triber comes with 4 exciting modes and 100+ seating combinations to give you all the space you need for your tribe and new experiences.
SUPER SPACIOUS

The new triber has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate comfort and convenience. it features cooled storage space in the centre console, best-in-class passenger cabin space, available in a sub-4m car and unmatched space in all rows with slide and recline 2nd row seats. it also features best-in-class boot space of 625 litres (in life mode) and interior storage of up to 31 litres
